subject: Re: [junit] Unable to make Junit4.3.1 work on my windows XP
msgSnippet: Can you post the exact value of your CLASSPATH? David Saff
messageBody:
Can you post the exact value of your CLASSPATH?

David Saff

On 7/17/07, oferstu <oferstu@...> wrote:
> I have installed JUnit4.3.1 according to the installation notes.
> That is, I unzipped the zip file into a folder, and then I added the
> directory and jar file into CLASSPATH.
> when I run java org.junit.runner.JUnitCore org.junit.tests.AllTests
>
> I get "Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError:
> org/junit/runner/JUnitCore"
>
> I have to note that other people got the exact same problem.
> How can this be solved?
>
>
>
>
>
>
> Yahoo! Groups Links
>
>
>
>
